name: Diclofenac Sodium
indications: diclofenac sodium topical solution nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory indicated treatment pain osteoarthritis knee ( ) . ( 1 )
contraindications: lowest effective shortest duration consistent individual patient treatment goals . recommended dose 2 pump actuations painful knee , 2 times day . ( 2 ) • apply diclofenac sodium topical solution , clean , dry skin . ( 2.1 ) • dispense 40 mg ( 2 pump actuations ) directly onto knee first hand onto knee . spread evenly around front , back sides knee . ( 2.1 ) • wash hands completely administering product . ( 2.2 ) • wait area completely dry covering clothing applying sunscreen , insect repellent , cosmetics , topical medications , substances . ( 2.2 ) • treated knee ( ) completely dry , avoid skin-to-skin contact people treated knee ( ) . ( 2.2 ) • get diclofenac sodium topical solution eyes , nose , mouth ( 2.2 ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: diclofenac sodium topical solution usp , 2 % w/w , supplied clear , colorless faintly pink orange solution containing 20 mg diclofenac sodium usp per gram solution , white polypropylene-dose pump bottle clear cap . pump actuation delivers 20 mg diclofenac sodium usp 1 gram solution . ndc number & size 112 g bottle……………………………………… . ndc # 68788-8743-1 storage store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: • known hypersensitivity diclofenac components product . ( 4 ) • history asthma , urticaria , allergic-type taking aspirin nsaids . ( 4 ) • setting coronary artery bypass graft ( cabg ) surgery . ( 4 )
indications_original: Diclofenac sodium topical solution is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug indicated for the treatment of the pain of osteoarthritis of the knee(s). ( 1 )
contraindications_original: Use the lowest effective dosage for the shortest duration consistent with individual patient treatment goals. The recommended dose is 2 pump actuations on each painful knee, 2 times a day. ( 2 ) • Apply diclofenac sodium topical solution, to clean, dry skin. ( 2.1 ) • Dispense 40 mg (2 pump actuations) directly onto the knee or first into the hand and then onto the knee. Spread evenly around front, back and sides of the knee. ( 2.1 ) • Wash hands completely after administering the product. ( 2.2 ) • Wait until the area is completely dry before covering with clothing or applying sunscreen, insect repellent, cosmetics, topical medications, or other substances. ( 2.2 ) • Until the treated knee(s) is completely dry, avoid skin-to-skin contact between other people and the treated knee(s). ( 2.2 ) • Do not get diclofenac sodium topical solution in your eyes, nose, or mouth ( 2.2 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Diclofenac sodium topical solution USP, 2% w/w, is supplied as a clear, colorless to faintly pink or orange solution containing 20 mg of diclofenac sodium USP per gram of solution, in a white polypropylene-dose pump bottle with a clear cap. Each pump actuation delivers 20 mg of diclofenac sodium USP in 1 gram of solution. 
                  
                     NDC Number & Size 
                  
                  112 g bottle……………………………………….NDC # 68788-8743-1
                  
                     Storage 
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: • Known hypersensitivity to      diclofenac or any components of the drug product. ( 4 ) • History of asthma, urticaria,      or allergic-type reactions after taking aspirin or other NSAIDs. ( 4 ) • In the setting of coronary      artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery. ( 4 )
